summary: This document is a compilation of daily lieutenant's logs from the Metropolitan Correctional Center in New York for July 22-23, 2019. It details routine prison operations, counts, and security checks, with the most significant entry being the placement of inmate Jeffrey Epstein on suicide watch in the early morning of July 23, 2019.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: The inmate referenced by name and registration number (#76318-054) who was placed on suicide watch at 1:38 AM on July 23, 2019.

events.title: Epstein Placed on Suicide Watch
events.description: At 1:38 AM, inmate Jeffrey Epstein (Reg. #76318-054) was moved to suicide watch. Medical staff and the Captain were notified, and a message was left for the duty psychologist.

locations: Metropolitan Correctional Center, New York, NY
keyFacts: Jeffrey Epstein (Reg. #76318-054) was placed on suicide watch at 1:38 AM on July 23, 2019, at the Metropolitan Correctional Center in New York.
The prison's fire alarm and sprinkler systems were reported as non-operational during these shifts, requiring a continuous fire watch.
Epstein was noted as being at a 'Local Hospice' and later a 'Goldcrest nursing facility' under the guard of USMS (U.S. Marshals Service) during this period.
The logs show routine institutional counts, security checks, and monitoring of phone calls for STG (Security Threat Group) and terrorist activity.
